summary: This API is utilized to retrieve the existing operating hours of sellers including Pickup Operating Hours, Special Hours and Instant Operating Hours
description: This API is utilized to retrieve the existing operating hours of sellers including Pickup Operating Hours, Special Hours and Instant Operating Hours.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/get_operating_hour_restrictions?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: regular_operating_hour_restrictions
schema.description: The restrictions for Pickup Operating Hours / Preferred Pickup Hours

schema.name: minimum_working_days_in_week
schema.description: Minimum number of days the seller needs to designate as working days per week (including Monday to Sunday, but excluding public holidays from the count).

schema.name: working_day_config
schema.description: The restrictions specific to each day

schema.name: monday
schema.description: The restrictions specific for Monday

schema.name: mandatory
schema.description: If the value is true, this day must be marked as open.

schema.name: minimum_operating_hour
schema.description: Minimum number of hours required for the seller to operate on that day.

schema.name: minimum_start_time
schema.description: The start hour for that day should not be set earlier than this time.

schema.name: maximum_start_time
schema.description: The start hour for that day should not be set later than this time.

schema.name: minimum_end_time
schema.description: The end hour for that day should not be set earlier than this time.

schema.name: maximum_end_time
schema.description: The end hour for that day should not be set later than this time.

schema.name: operating_24_hour_toggle
schema.description: If the toggle value is true, the user can set the start_time to 00:00 and the end_time to 23:59 to indicate that the shop is operating 24 hours a day.

error_codes.message: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: This shop isn't eligible to set up Regular Operating Hours.
